Docs.summary: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an .

remarks.format:
## Examples Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> ai tipi derivati di un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In base alle impostazioni di <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, l'operazione di scaricamento del <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> metodo può essere ritardato finché l'intero <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> viene chiuso.
## Examples Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> metodo (in una classe derivata) quando si aggiungono le risorse per un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]
